page.title: 10Shops and shopping
page.content: North Bradley village has no shops in it. It only has a Post Office. In a survey we did we asked a hundred families where they buy their clothes. It showed that sixty three people bought their clothes in Bath, twenty seven people bought their clothes in Trowbridge, five families bought their clothes in Swindon, three families bought their clothes in Bristol and two families bought their clothes in Frome.We sent out a questionaire too see where families did their main food shopping. We surveyed one hundred people and the results showed that ninty four families bought their food in Trowbridge, three families bought their food in Warminster, one family bought their food in Frome and one family bought their food in Crockerton near Warminster.
